jobs.title: CTO and Co-Founder
jobs.description:
FinHive is a niche start-up aiming to provide an automated digital credit alternative. We help customers avoid overdraft and other expensive and longer lasting credit alternatives with bureaucratic application processes. Our aim is to democratise the borrowing space and our innovative financial solution helps customers be money positive. Community encompasses everything we do, and we are wholeheartedly committed to improving the society that we are a part of. With our clear, intuitive FinTech solution, we hope to provide an accessible and reliable solution for money management.
We are looking for an individual who is determined to work and learn within a fast-paced environment. Willing to take the lead on your own initiative, you will be given a lot of responsibility and freedom to make the most of your skills. However, you will also be building your team up and representing the company as co-founder. 
If you’re interested in changing the cost structure and business model dictated by banks in the short-term lending market today – FinHive offers a chance to become an integral stakeholder in a rapidly expanding sector. I am seeking a hands-on Co-Founder and CTO to join our current team of 7 people to develop and execute technological methodologies for the FinHive business. Ideally, you will have a background in financial technology with a focus on lending. 
Your qualifications:

- Knowledge of financial or FinTech space and an interest and willingness to learn 
- Strong experience in software development and information security
- Track-record of delivering well-engineered products with modern technologies
- Worked on a diverse set of full stack technologies including experience with web, mobile, data and infrastructure
- Ideally been part of the development team in a lending business
- Experience in developing an MVP by yourself and leading the full IT roadmap  

We offer a great share in equity as you’ll be driving the technology from scratch and owning it as a permanent management board member as we grow. If you consider yourself tech savvy, can quickly identify technological opportunities coupled with business and commercial operations and would like to grow a business and share an outlook to making a material impact in the Financial Services sector, please express your interest and we will respond to suitable applicants.
 
**About you:**
Motivated to join a start-up as a co-founder - managing uncertainty and ability to get the job done 
Active ownership and a passion for team building and motivating employees
Strong communication skills with a variety of technical and non-technical audiences
Strong and established technical network and can leverage this network to build the business
Personal interest in changing the financial landscape with customer-centric product offering

*We are highly committed to the safety and wellbeing of all our employees. Thus, we all work remotely until further notice. If you consider yourself a good fit please express your interest with a short intro and your CV and we will respond to every suitable applicant.*

Thank you!

www.finhive.co.uk

jobs.title: Marketing + Design Intern
jobs.description:
FinHive is a niche start-up aiming to provide a financial alternative. We offer a secure and automated digital alternative avoiding bureaucratic credit applications with expensive and longer lasting credit alternatives. Our aim is to democratise the borrowing space and our mission is to help customers be money positive. Community encompasses everything we do, and we are wholeheartedly committed to improving the society that we are a part of. With our clear, intuitive FinTech solution, we hope to provide an accessible and reliable solution for money management. 

We are looking for individuals who are determined to work and learn within an agile and fast paced environment. Willing to take the lead on your own initiative, you will be given a lot of responsibility and freedom to make the most of your skills. This role will require you to be confident in your own abilities and work independently on deliverables. However, you will also be part of a fast growing team within a startup environment so will frequently be required to communicate with the entire management team.

This is a great opportunity for individuals looking to join a startup team within the FinTech environment. It will be a fantastic stepping stone into the FinTech space with the potential to onboard on a more permanent basis as operations scale-up. You will get to be responsible for a large part of the marketing effort and really take control over its direction. For those looking to prove themselves to potential employers or simply looking for a new challenge this would enable you to both build your portfolio whilst contributing to a real marketing effort.

**About you:**
-Knowledge of financial or FinTech space - or an interest and willingness to learn about it 
-Ability to juggle multiple deliverables and manage your own work streams efficiently
-A team player, someone who loves to bounce ideas off others 
-Capable of working autonomously
-Not afraid to take the lead and follow your own initiative
-Studying marketing for an undergraduate or graduate degree in the UK
-Able to offer 24 hours per week, starting immediately

**Benefits include:**
-Opportunity to work closely with Founders
-Learning about the FinTech space
-Working in a agile startup environment
-Exceptional responsibility for an internship
-Great office in WeWork 

*We are highly committed to the safety and wellbeing of all our employees. Thus all work will be remote until further notice. If you consider yourself a good fit please express your interest and we will respond to suitable applicants.*
